item.title: AB InBev Sustainability Challenge
item.description: My team made it to the final round of Anheuser-Busch InBev's case competition for first-year MBA students.

item.title: Hobbies
item.description: In addition to making graphics, I like to make other things as well. Here are a few things that I've made. Wall Art This is an origami piece made from cardstock. The piece on the left was designed using Cricut Design studio, and the piece on the right is a version made from cardstock. Wedding Backdrop In September 2019, my mom and I made this backdrop for a family wedding. The flowers were cut using a Cricut and are made out of cardstock and old jewelry.

item.title: RGB
item.description: This is a graphic I made to help me learn RGB color codes.

item.description: I made some signs for the 2019 Chicago Marathon.

item.title: A Modern Take on Mergers & Acquisitions
item.description: These are some interactive graphics that depict some basic M&A transactions.

item.description: In this MBA course I was able to apply my newly acquired programming skills to a variety of analytical challenges based in the health care industry.
